content: DX 6-IE Powder-actuated insulation fastening nailer Fully automatic powder-actuated fastening nailer for fastening insulation to concrete, masonry and steel ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Quick, one-step solution for fastening insulation boards (soft and hard) and mineral wool to concrete, masonry and steel Higher productivity – automatic piston return and cartridge advancement equip you to work up to 5 times faster than alternative fastening methods One-step energy level setting – expanded on-tool power adjustment means you can use a single cartridge color for many fastenings Easy to operate – precise control helps to deliver consistent, more accurate fastening On-board display – shows when your nailer needs cleaning or maintenance Applications Fastening insulation boards to soft and tough concrete, steel, and CMU Fastening insulation to walls and ceilings Fastening light ventilated façade insulation Fastening ETICS insulation Fastening basement perimeter wall insulation ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dimensions (LxWxH): 23.9 x 2.7 x 7.5 in Weight: 7.7 lb. Fastener Intake: Insulation Technical Data | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 23.9 x 2.7 x 7.5 in | Weight | 7.7 lb | Fastener Intake | Insulation | Fastener length range | 0.79 - 7.87 in | Automatic piston return | Yes | Bluetooth | No | Power (max.) | 335 J | Power regulation | Yes ### ITEMS- 3806364 - KIT DX 6-IE + X-IE 50+6.8/11 M10T (3K) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DX 6_01 NFC Basic unit - 1x X-6-5-PIE-L Piston assy - 1x X-6-FIE-L Fastener guide assy - 1x DX 6 Cleaning kit - 1x DX 460 / 462 / 5 / 6 Tool case - 3000x Insulation fastener X-IE 6-50 - 3000x DX Cartridge 6,8/11 M10-X10 T titanium Bulk - 2156170 - Powder-actuated tool DX 6 IE - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DX 6_01 NFC Basic unit - 1x X-6-5-PIE-L Piston assy - 1x X-6-FIE-L Fastener guide assy - 1x DX 6 Cleaning kit - 1x DX 460 / 462 / 5 / 6 Tool case
